changelog:
# Design
+ Better & centered icon
+ Better splash screen
+ Better send button
+ Rounded chatbox
+ New animations & more

# Chat
+ Your chat history no longer resets
+ Starboard: save a message separately
+ Options for messages: long press a message to access them
+ Typing status for Ensi

# DLCs
+ DLCs now have thumbnails
+ DLCs can now change Ensi's avatar
+ and more

# More options
+ Save chat history, enabled by default
+ Updates, checks for Ensicord updates everytime you start Ensicord, enabled by default
+ Debug mode, saves logs in a text file, disabled by default

# Fixes
+ All avatars are shown correctly, even the low resolution ones
+ New lines and extra messages no longer get removed when sending a message
